alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 9:51PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...An area of strong showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Big Horn and southwestern Yellowstone Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 949 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong showers and isolated thunderstorms from Billings, south to Pryor, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Lockwood, Shepherd, Huntley, Billings Heights, Worden, Pryor, Billings West End, Ballantine and Fort Smith. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone
